text: Pang Ton Phueng railway station is a railway station located in Ban Dan Na Kham Subdistrict, Uttaradit City, Uttaradit. It is located 509.363 km from Bangkok railway station and is a class 3 railway station. It is on the Northern Line of the State Railway of Thailand. ==Train services== * Rapid 111/112 Bangkok-Den Chai-Bangkok * Local 407/408 Nakhon Sawan-Chiang Mai- Nakhon Sawan == References == * Ichirō, Kakizaki (2010). Ōkoku no tetsuro: tai tetsudō no rekishi. Kyōto: Kyōtodaigakugakujutsushuppankai. * Otohiro, Watanabe (2013). Tai kokutetsu yonsenkiro no tabi: shasō fūkei kanzen kiroku. Tōkyō: Bungeisha. Category:Railway stations in Thailand
title: Pang Ton Phueng railway station
